alert.note: Alert for Santa Fe Metro Area; West Central Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 21 at 10:50AM MST until February 23 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM WEDNESDAY TO 2 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Santa Fe Metro Area and West Central Highlands. * WHEN...From 8 AM Wednesday to 2 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A period of snow late Wednesday afternoon through Wednesday evening may produce low visibility with blowing snow and slick travel.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Santa Fe Metro Area; West Central Highlands
